sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(POINT - USE_POINT), 0) FROM TB_PURCHS_POINT WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_POINT (ESNTL_ID, POINT_SN, POINT, ACCML_SE, ACCML_DT, VALID_DT) SELECT #esntl_id#, NVL(MAX(POINT_SN), 0) + 1, #point#, #accml_se#, SYSDATE, #valid_dt# FROM TB_POINT
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_PURCHS_POINT WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id#

SELECT C.CODE_NM AS ACCML_SE_NM, TO_CHAR(ACCML_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ACCML_DT , G.GOODS_NM, P.ACCML_SE, P.POINT, P.USE_POINT , TO_CHAR(RECENT_USE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RECENT_USE_DT , P.POINT - P.USE_POINT AS REST_POINT FROM ( SELECT PURCHS_SN, CART_SN, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT PURCHS_SN, CART_SN FROM TB_PURCHS_POINT WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# ORDER BY ACCML_DT DESC ) A ) B INNER JOIN TB_PURCHS_POINT P ON B.PURCHS_SN = P.PURCHS_SN AND B.CART_SN = P.CART_SN INNER JOIN TB_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE C ON P.ACCML_SE = C.CODE AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM005' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CART_GOODS CG ON P.CART_SN = CG.CART_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GOODS G ON CG.GOODS_CODE = G.GOODS_CODE WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #startIdx# AND #endIdx#
SELECT PURCHS_SN, CART_SN, POINT - USE_POINT AS POINT FROM TB_PURCHS_POINT WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND POINT - USE_POINT > 0 AND EXPRTN_AT = 'N' ORDER BY PURCHS_SN
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_PURCHS_POINT SET USE_POINT = USE_POINT + #point#, RECENT_USE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND PURCHS_SN = #purchs_sn# AND CART_SN = #cart_sn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PURCHS_POINT_HISTORY ( PURCHS_SN, POINT_PURCHS_SN, CART_SN, ESNTL_ID, POINT, USE_DT) VALUES (#point_purchs_sn#, #purchs_sn#, #cart_sn#, #esntl_id#, #point#, SYSDATE)
